name: tcov2bsml
description: convert tcov files into BSML documents
synopsis: USAGE: tcov2bsml.pl -t tcov_file -b bsml_repository_path -o output_file_bsml -d database -a assembly_id

options.description: [REQUIRED] file containing tcov data • --output,-o [REQUIRED] output BSML file containing coverage information • --bsml_repository,-b [REQUIRED] filepath to the bsml repository • --chunk_size,-c [OPTIONAL] optional chunk size (default is 1000 bases) • --help,-h This help message
